de.ityx.mediatrix.api.client

Interface ICBuzzword


  • public interface ICBuzzword
    Provides functions to manage the buzzword objects Buzzword.
    How to use:
    API.getClientAPI().getBuzzwordAPI().delete(buzzword);

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean delete(Buzzword buzzword)
      Deletes the buzzword and returns true when the operation is completed with success!
      void hardResetCache()
      Utilities requires to hard reset the cache
      Buzzword load(int locId)
      Returns the buzzword Object which is mapped with the id
      List<Buzzword> loadBuzzword(String text, List<Integer> subprojectIds, boolean exactSearch)
      Returns a List of buzzwords corresponding the given parameters!

      Returns a List of buzzwords.

      Refreshes the buzzword buzzword and returns true when the operation is completed with success!

      Unlocks the buzzword buzzword and returns true when the operation is completed with success!

      Sets this buzzword list with buzzlist.
